articles.title: Aerospace Leader Howmet Poised To Hit New Buy Point
articles.mainIdea: Aerospace Leader Howmet Poised To Hit New Buy Point
articles.summary: Investor's Business Daily: Aerospace Leader Howmet Poised To Hit New Buy Point. Howmet Stock: The aerospace leader is approaching a new buy point following strong gains in recent sessions. Related tickers mentioned: BA, EADSF, GE, HWM, SWK.

articles.title: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain
articles.mainIdea: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain
articles.summary: Zacks: Airbus Secures Contract to Supply 100 Military Helicopters to Spain. EADSY wins Spain's largest helicopter procurement, agreeing to supply 100 military aircraft across four models to modernize the nation's armed forces. Related tickers mentioned: BA, EADSF, EADSY, TXT.

articles.title: RTX Clinches a $1.7B Deal to Provide Four Patriot Missiles to Spain
articles.mainIdea: RTX Clinches a $1.7B Deal to Provide Four Patriot Missiles to Spain
articles.summary: Zacks: RTX Clinches a $1.7B Deal to Provide Four Patriot Missiles to Spain. RTX lands a $1.7B deal to deliver four Patriot missile defense systems to Spain, highlighting strong global demand for the platform. Related tickers mentioned: BA, NOC, RTX.

articles.title: This Recent IPO Drops 59% After Big Rise. What’s Behind the Wild Swings.
articles.mainIdea: This Recent IPO Drops 59% After Big Rise. What’s Behind the Wild Swings.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: This Recent IPO Drops 59% After Big Rise. What’s Behind the Wild Swings.. Shares of Starfighters Space plummeted Tuesday in another tumultuous trading session following the space-launch company’s completion of its initial public offering last week. Starfighters, which says it owns and operates the world’s largest commercial supersonic aircraft fleet, began trading on the NYSE American small-cap exchange on Thursday. Starfighters is based at NASA’s Kennedy Space Center in Florida. Related tickers mentioned: FJET, RKLB.
